questions.question: What problem may be involved in an experiment involving animals?
options: Any results may not apply to humans.
It may be complicated to get permission.
Students may not be happy about animal experiments.

questions.question: What question do they decide the experiment should address?
options: Are mice capable of controlling their food intake?
Does an increase in sugar lead to health problems?
How much do supplements of different kinds affect health?
